function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Short-term focus on health and livelihoods without considering long-term health and environmental impacts","Impact":"Potential for a return to high emissions and non-sustainable energy use","Mitigation":"Incorporate green stimulus and sustainable investments into recovery packages","Technologies":"Cleantech, energy efficiency, renewables, clean energy infrastructure","People":"General population, environment","Owner":"Governments, policymakers"},{"Description":"Reliance on fossil fuels despite evidence of superior economic returns from sustainable initiatives","Impact":"Risk of lower economic returns and increased environmental damage","Mitigation":"Shift investments towards sustainable energy and cleantech","Technologies":"Renewables, energy efficiency, clean energy infrastructure","People":"General population, environment","Owner":"Governments, policymakers"},{"Description":"Inadequate support for cleantech market progress and green energy initiatives","Impact":"Missed opportunity for effective short- and medium-term stimulus and economic growth","Mitigation":"Increase support and investment in cleantech and green energy sectors","Technologies":"Cleantech, green energy, efficiency and electricity sectors","People":"General population, workers in cleantech sectors","Owner":"Governments, policymakers"}]}
